item.title: Hugo 101
item.description: Env: MacOS Goal: Create a Hugo static website ( --theme personal-web ) Deploy the website in a Github project page https://<USERNAME>.github.io/<PROJECT> 1 Install Hugo brew install hugo 2 Create a new Hugo project hugo new site blog 3 Select & Download “theme” cd blog/theme git clone https://github.com/bjacquemet/personal-web cd .. hugo server -D Copy “theme” stuff to Your project directory. Clean up the content in “content”, only keeping the structure.
this is my first hugo post
